messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
LGTM although i don't understand the remark about semicolons

The usage comment for tracing showed a call terminated with a semicolon.
This is what triggered the CL which lead to a slightly larger change. Will
adjust the CL description.

- gri

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=9a929b2b7cf1 ***

go/parser: minor internal cleanups

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6356046

subject: code review 6356046: go/parser: no terminating ; and minor cleanups
